armedText: For situations requiring an elevated level of protection, our armed security guard stand ready to provide the security you need

questions: If you have any questions or comments, please fill out this form and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.  If you need to speak with someone right away you can call us at (720) 468-2411.  We’re looking forward to hearing from you!

FAQDesc: At Mayor Security, we understand that our customers often have questions about our security services. That's why we've compiled a comprehensive FAQ section to address the most commonly asked questions. If your question isn't listed, feel free to reach out to our customer service team for further assistance.
FAQ1: Do I Have To Pay For A Quote?
FAQ1Desc: No! we offer a free quotes for all of our services. We can also offer you multiple quotes for different numbers of visits and durations, so you can choose which option better fulfills your security needs!
FAQ2: Can I Change My Plan Later?
FAQ2Desc: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your service plan at any time. Just let us know and we can offer you new proposals that will better suit your needs!
FAQ3Desc: Unless there is a specific contract for a fixed term, you may cancel our services at any time with a 30-day notice in advance.
FAQ4Desc: We have a simple billing system that allows you to pay for services on a monthly, biweekly, or weekly basis. You can choose the option that best fits your needs.
FAQ5: What Types of Security Services Do You Offer?
FAQ5Desc: We offer a wide range of security services, including unarmed and armed security guards, mobile patrols, event security, and more. Our team can work with you to create a customized security plan that meets your specific needs.
FAQ6Desc: Our security consultants are here to provide expert advice and tailored solutions for your security challenges. Contact us today to schedule a consultation and enhance your security strategy.
FooterDesc: Providing professional security services you can trust with trained personnel for all your security needs.
